Text:
Unbelievable! Are you saying that not only Lady
Karen but also Sergey of the Seven Blades are
leaders within the Cult?!

It's just speculation based on our exchange during
the rescue mission. Nothing is confirmed yet, but...

At the very least, Sergey knew about the Garden,
and was trying to kill Lady Karen.

And Lady Karen, on her part, seemed unable to accept
she had been abandoned by the Cult after becoming
possessed.

...I understand the Herzog Family comes from a
prestigious and longstanding noble lineage within
the Empire, known for their virtue and fairness,
but...

Specifically, what aspects of their conduct are
highly regarded?

Indeed! The governance of the territories by the
aristocrats who are vassals to the Empire varies
significantly from region to region.

Yet the Herzog Family has maintained stability over
their governed lands.

They are proactive in addressing the petitions of
their residents, and although small in size, their
army is highly disciplined... Not to mention, each
successor has been a skilled dark knight.

As for Lady Karen, she was chosen as one of
Velgalta's Seven Blades because of her skill
not only with the sword but also with the spear.

Externally, they seem like exemplary rulers in both
war and peace.

Such admirable rulers, yet behind the scenes...
Their people are unwittingly being controlled
by the Cult.

It seems we'll need to get more details directly from
her, including the truth of this matter...
...Why haven't you killed me?
Oh, would you like us to kill you?
*gasp*

Wait, if we're going to kill her anyway, I wanna use
her as a test subject...
Um, Eta?!
Test subject... Test subject...
Eta.
Mnhh...

...There are so many things I don't understand about
this place and all of you.

And...I still can't believe my symptoms of possession
have actually been cured!
Heheh... You know it better than anyone, don't you?
...Lady Karen von Herzog.

If you are indeed a leader of the Cult of Diablos,
two paths are laid out before you.

One is to tell us everything you know about the Cult,
leave it all behind, and join us...the Shadow Garden.

And the other...is to tell us everything you know
about the Cult—right here, right now. And then...

That life of yours that was saved from possession
will be ended by my sword.

Have you not considered a third path, where I become
a martyr for the Cult and take my own life?

You were fleeing from your pursuers. You used your
spear as a walking stick, even as you were consumed
by the symptoms of possession.

It was because you wanted to survive. Because you
wanted to rebel against your fate.

While you risked being killed by those chasing you,
would you really take your own life?

It's unlikely, even if you weren't unarmed right now.
If you'd like, I can lend you a spear to stab yourself
with.
Y-You...

Lady Karen, do not underestimate this individual
despite her childlike appearance.
That stance... Are you a Velgalta soldier?

And also a former possessed, just like you, who has
lost everything but her life.
Mnhh!
Lady Karen...I don't believe you're evil.

For you to defend me in a situation like that, it's
not something anyone could do, even if they wanted
to.

You may have been working for the Cult...but I feel
you have a sense of duty and pride toward your
position as an aristocrat.
Could you explain it to us?

About who you were to the Cult and the role you
played?

...Even if it means torturing it out of me or
resorting to drugging me...?

I would prefer those to be final resorts. Let's try
to make this a positive encounter for both of us.

After all, we may have a long relationship ahead of
us, although it would be that of a superior and her
subordinate.
What a sales pitch!
Alpha applies pressure, and Gamma appeases... I see.
...Very well.

There is nothing left for me anymore. It might be
worth relinquishing everything, pride and all.
There's always something left.

Because we are also here. And you are here too...
aren't you?
Wait... Were all of you also once possessed?!
That's right.

And the Shadow Garden operates all across the
world with a mission to save the possessed.

...And to destroy the Cult of Diablos while we're
at it.
I see...
If that's the case...

...I'll tell you everything I know. After that, you
can do what you want with my life.
Then...be my test subject...later...

That...I'll have to turn down. I've got an incredibly
bad feeling about agreeing to that.
Jeez...
Heheh.
